column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////There are so many things to love about CB.  The coffee and pastries are as good as it gets.  As others have said
column2: it's crowded and parking is a nightmare
column3: but it's really good.  The extended hours are a big plus.  The service was off on our last visit (items left off the order
column4: something else delivered that we didn't order and questioned by the server when we said it wasn't ours
column6: but it was spring break and the place was packed with kids so we'll try again.
